alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Lafayette; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 8:58AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, southern Acadia and northeastern Vermilion Parishes through 930 AM CDT... At 858 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Kaplan, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lafayette, Crowley, Abbeville, Scott, Rayne, Kaplan, Forked Island, Erath, Delcambre, Duson, Maurice, Morse, Meaux, Esther, Wright, Mire, Indian Bayou, Lyons Point, Ridge and Estherwood. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 78 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
